description: Prints selected information from one or more DICOM files to stdout.

tag.title: DICOM Tag(s)
tag.description: Specify one or more DICOM tags to print, in the format aaaa,bbbb where aaaa and bbbb are hexadecimal digits.

sepstr.title: Field Separator
sepstr.description: Use the specified string to separate fields instead of space.

full_entry.title: Full Entry Flag
full_entry.description: Output the full entry if it is more than one word or contains white space.

no_name.title: No Name Flag
no_name.description: Omit the filename from the output.

namelast.title: Name Last Flag
namelast.description: Place the filename last in the output instead of first.
